url.description: In deployment context the final url that the site will sit (exclude subDir as it auto gets added). In content context its only used for endpoints

location.description: When ftp/scp content this is where the files are pulled from, in ftp/sftp this is where files are placed

ssh.description: The correct secret.json file to grab when deploying, should be stored in ~/targets

ftp.description: The ftp IP, .ftppass with all ftp creds should be stored in ~/targets

ftps.description: The ftps IP, .ftppass with all ftp creds should be stored in ~/targets

lftp.description: The lftp IP, .ftppass with all ftp creds should be stored in ~/targets

aws-s3.description: The aws IAM profile that should be used when connected to s3. The profile should be found in the config file located in the .aws folder

aws-eb.description: The aws eb environment that should be deployed to. The profile will be deduced from the .elasticbeanstalk/config file and located in the .aws folder

cookie.description: Set to override the cookie value, if not set then it will use the title of the instance

singleUserExpireTime.description: Used for single time user passwords to dictate how long the user is valid for. Provide as plain english e.g 2 minutes. default: 1 hour

logo.description: Set which logo to use on the login page (only works on style-1)

subDir.description: If sub directory needed then specify name here e.g. 'test'

commands.description: Commands to run locally and on the server both pre and post deploy

pre.description: Command that runs locally before the deployment

post.description: Command that runs locally after the deployment

pre.description: Command that runs on the server before the deployment

post.description: Command that runs on the server before the deployment

paths.description: Specify the files/folders to deploy from the root directory.

items.description: An array of globbed strings or objects defining the files to deploy

src.description: The globbed path to the file/folder from the project root e.g public/*

dest.description: An optional destination to the final location of the src file/folder

ignore.description: An array of strings defining the files/folders to ignore
